description:
This is the official New York Rangers mobile app for the 2014/15 season. It gives you the very latest scores, news, stats, highlights and photos. The new app is the easiest way to keep up with everything Rangers hockey.
And if you're at Madison Square Garden for a game you can get video instant replays,  and order food or merchandise directly from your phone!


Features:
-  News:  Real-time breaking news, posts, galleries and videos from the Rangers, previews of upcoming match ups, and post-game summaries.  
-  WIFI: Connect to FreeMSG WIFI inside the arena
-  Video:  Video-on-demand clips of Rangers game action.
-  Photos:  Galleries of players and game-time action.
-  Stats:  Real-time statistics and scores from the official NHL stats engine, head-to-head stats of the matchup, player profiles and stats, box scores, and other scores around the league.
-  Social Media: Facebook, Twitter and Instagram integration with one-click sharing of all news items.
-  In-seat ordering: Order food, drinks and team merchandise directly from your seat.
-  Garden 366;  iconic Garden events gallery displayed for every day of the year. 
-  Schedule:  Upcoming games, and scores/stats of previous games from this season, ticket purchase for games.
-  Where to Watch: Find out where to tune in if you can't make it to the game.
-  Directions:   Arena maps, seating chart, and directions for getting to/around the arena.
releaseNotes:
15.0.1
• Update to Schedule listing
• bug fixes
15.0.0
• Updated design with new homepage to include tabs for News, Twitter and Schedule.
• Facebook, Twitter and Instagram integration
• Updated game and team stats.
• Live, in-arena video replays while you are at the game. First connect to FreeMSG WIFI – then tap Video.
• New menu items in Eat/Shop
